import React from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; //import FadeIn from "react-fade-in"; import axios from "axios"; import HeaderPage from "./header"; import FooterPage from "./footer"; // import HomePage from "./home"; import SidebarPage from "./sidebar"; import firebase from '../config'; //import Pagination from "react-js-pagination"; import swal from 'sweetalert'; class EmployeeList extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', designation: '', mobile_number: '', department: '', location: '', uploadImage: '', address: '', phone_emergency: '', reporting_manager: '', EmployeesList: [], isUploading: false, error_message: '', date: new Date().toLocaleString(), validError: true, loading: false, count: 1, activePage: "1", countPage: "", EmployeesList: [] }; } componentDidMount() { var ref = firebase .database() .ref('Employees/'); ref.once("value", snapshot => { const data = []; console.log(snapshot.val()); snapshot.forEach(element => { const usersData = { employeeID: element .key .toString(), first_name: element .val() .first_name, last_name: element .val() .last_name, email: element .val() .email, designation: element .val() .designation, mobile_number: element .val() .mobile_number, department: element .val() .department, location: element .val() .location, address: element .val() .address, reporting_manager: element .val() .reporting_manager, date: element .val() .date } data.unshift(usersData); }); this.setState({ Employees: data }, () => { console.log(this.state.Employees, 'Employees'); }); }) } handlePageChange(pageNumber) { console.log(`active page is ${pageNumber}`); this.setState({activePage: pageNumber}); } render() { return (
